body_html: Sorry for the late reply. Sure, I can add unit tests, I am just really not sure what kind of unit test you are expecting? The function itself and the one it wraps are both already unit tested. Should I duplicate the scatter_nd_add gradient unit tests (if there are any) and apply them to sparse_to_dense?

body: Sorry for the late reply. Sure, I can add unit tests, I am just really not sure what kind of unit test you are expecting? The function itself and the one it wraps are both already unit tested. Should I duplicate the `scatter_nd_add` gradient unit tests (if there are any) and apply them to `sparse_to_dense`?
